title: John Deaton Says Jim Cramer Should Be ‘Ashamed’ for Misleading the Public on XRP
description: On 31 August 2023, John Deaton, a prominent, highly-respected attorney closely monitoring the U.S. SEC’s lawsuit against FinTech firm Ripple, attacked former hedge fund manager Jim Cramer’s claim (during an episode of CNBC’s “Mad Money”) that the public knows nothing about XRP. title: Defi Sector Navigates an Extended Crypto Winter: TVL Dips to February 2021 Levels
description: The realm of decentralized finance (defi) is grappling with the aftermath of the sweeping crypto market slump that marked the close of August. As it stands, the total value locked (TVL) in defi, pegged at $37.59 billion, has plummeted to a low last witnessed in the second week of February 2021. Crypto Winter’s Grip on […]

title: UK lawmakers call for global alliance to tackle misuse of AI
description: UK lawmakers suggest drafting a bill to help establish effective AI governance.  In four years, the adoption of AI has surged by a remarkable 270%.
